definitions.definition: a planned group of especially political, business, or military activities that are intended to achieve a particular aim:
examples: The protests were part of their campaign against the proposed building development in the area.

definitions.definition: a group of connected actions or movements that forms part of a war:
to organize a series of activities to try to achieve something:
examples: [ + to infinitive ] They've been campaigning for years to get him out of prison.
